alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 11:38AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Calhoun and central Ouachita Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1137 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Poison Springs State Park, or 8 miles northwest of Camden, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... Highland Industrial Park... East Camden... Delhi... Harmony Grove... Frenchport... Elliot... Cross Roads in Ouachita County... Fairview in Ouachita County... Locust Bayou... Warner... Bragg City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
